video_prompt: Subtle glowing and pulsating of the red energy around the figure, with tiny sparks emanating outwards. slight camera zoom in. Soft flickering of the red lights in the background city.
image_prompt: A full-body shot of a sleek, chrome humanoid figure with glowing red eyes, running towards the viewer down the center of a futuristic city street. The figure is encased in a swirling vortex of bright, shimmering red particles and light trails that emanate from its body, creating a sense of dynamic motion. The background consists of tall, stylized modern skyscrapers on either side, blurred and streaked to emphasize speed. Some buildings show faint, blurred rectangular lights or screens. The overall lighting is desaturated and cool-toned with vibrant red accents from the figure's power. The atmosphere is energetic and action-packed. The bottom right corner features a modern, clean white logo: "c29."
refined_video_prompt: The red energy around the figure subtly glows and pulsates, emitting tiny outward sparks. The camera gently zooms in. Red lights in the distant city softly flicker.
creative_video_prompt_1: Explosive red energy bursts violently around the figure, sending shimmering sparks careening outwards as the camera lunges forward. Neon city lights flicker erratically, then melt into streaks of pure crimson. Towering skyscrapers buckle and writhe like liquid chrome, their facades cracking to reveal pulsating light. The ground ripples, sending objects flying, as a chaotic vortex of energy engulfs the scene, threatening to tear reality apart.
creative_video_prompt_2: The red energy swirls, pulling the city's buildings into glowing tendrils that ripple and dissolve into pure light. The figure becomes liquid chrome, stretching and contracting in impossible angles while the sparks reverse, drawing back into the vortex, time itself unraveling around them. Colors bleed from architectural forms, dripping upward into a nonexistent sky.
creative_video_prompt_3: The camera executes a rapid push-in, accentuating the figure's intense red gaze. As the camera dramatically sweeps around, the energy field around the figure pulsates fiercely, unleashing a torrent of sparks that momentarily illuminate the blurring city lights. As if propelled by an unseen force, the figure lunges forward, dissolving into a streak of light, leaving a lingering crimson afterglow.
